comment.body:
Unfortunately MV3 extension cannot update filters, so new rules will be available in one of the next extension update.
Until then, please add following rules:
```adblock
samuraiscan.cookni.net##div[id^="ad-container"]
samuraiscan.cookni.net##body > .wrap + div[id][class*=" "]
samuraiscan.cookni.net#%#//scriptlet('prevent-addEventListener', 'DOMContentLoaded', '/^function\(e\) \{ init\(\); \}$/')
```
to user rules.
